metadata.name: No Auto-Cutscenes
metadata.description:
[h1]Update: Mega Satan and The Beast unlocks are now supported![/h1]
To get your unlocks/achievements/completion marks, make sure you walk into the chest rather than taking the void portal. Check your completion marks on the pause menu, and make your choice.
Update: If you have Repentogon, you'll get your unlocks/achievements/completion marks immediately without having to walk into the chest.
You can also give yourself the completion marks later on with these console commands (which will also end the game): [code] no-auto-cutscenes unlock mega satan no-auto-cutscenes unlock the beast [/code]
[hr][/hr] This mod was inspired by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2667845009]NO Mega Satan auto cutscene[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=938928749]AlwaysVoid[/url]. It can block the cutscenes from automatically playing after Mega Satan and The Beast.
[list] [*]Mega Satan [list] [*]A chest will spawn in the boss room [*]A door will spawn allowing you to exit the room [*]Optionally, a void portal will also spawn [/list] [*]The Beast [list] [*]You'll be taken back to the living room where you fought Dogma [*]A chest will spawn [*]Optionally, a void portal will also spawn [/list] [/list]
For challenges, trophies will spawn instead of chests.
Mod Config Menu can be used to: [list] [*]block the cutscenes after Mega Satan and/or The Beast [*]change the void portal spawning probability [*]apply your settings to challenges or not [/list]
Note: Even if you choose to allow the Mega Satan cutscene, the game may still decide to spawn a chest and void portal instead.
